ISSUE.TITLE: Add date range selection
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Right now each query defines its date range. We should support putting something like $DATE_MIN and $DATE_MAX as variables in queries, and let the query runner determine them - with some sort of default. This will allow selecting ranges beyond the default without modifying the queries.
